Sports Helmet

A helmet for women's lacrosse to help reduce the likely hood of concussions and other head injuries.

  • Client

    Envato Inc.

  • Patent Number:

    US D802,846 S
Toilet Redesign

This toilet was designed, by myself and a partner, to help families with children going through potty training, as well as being able to evolve with the family after potty training. This project was a collaboration between MIAD and Delta Faucet.

  • Collaboration

    Milwaukee Institute of Art & Design (MIAD)
    &
    Delta Faucet

  • Designers:

    Caitlin Washburn
    &
    Sara Monoe

Ignis

Ignis is an electric, zero-turn, riding lawn mower, designed by myself and a partner.

  • Collaboration

    Milwaukee Institute of Art & Design (MIAD)
    &
    Briggs & Stratton

  • Designers:

    Caitlin Washburn
    &
    Marcello Allamos

Bowhaus

Rotationally molded dog house for large breed dogs.

  • Awards:

    The Association of Rotational Molder's, 2014 Student Design Competition 2nd Place Award winner.
    &
    The Society of Plastics Engineer, Rotational Molding Division Product Design Competition - Honorable Mention
